group_1.textRight: Shall we go now, Lady Nayuta?@To Yukuni.

group_1.textLeft: The sweets that Mikage gave me are in my bag.

group_1.textRight: A pleasure to meet you, I am Alexandra Kurusu.
Please feel free to call me Sasha, eheheâ™ª

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Oh, a foreigner...? Without a "hallo"...?

group_1.textRight: Did she not just speak Japanese? I asked her to come@because she is from the same town.

group_1.textLeft: I understand now.@I look forward to working with you.

group_1.textRight: Sure, I look forward to working with you.
Um, Rabi,@was it really okay for me to come along?

group_1.textLeft: The "what ifs" may be too difficult for me to handle@on my own.

group_1.narration: I wasn't going to say anything@until she finished going over her answers@regarding the professor's words, but...
Since Nayuta's efforts have begun to bear fruit@and the fact that she is getting closer and closer@to the professor, I think it is about time@we tell her about the connection between him and us.
